Description.Name: Scapha HVT
Description.Details: The G configuration is designed as long-range sniper, and can serve as spotter for a C3 Network. Its main weapons are pair of Light AC/2 mounted in its turret. The autocannons are guided by a Targeting Computer and are fed by two tons of ammunition which can be loaded with different ammo types. Also mounted in this configuration is a C3 Slave Unit. The Scapha Hovertank is a thirty-second century Hover OmniVehicle which was originally exclusively produced for the Armed Forces of the Republic of the Sphere. Built by Grumman Industries on Terra in 3123, the Scapha was designed with the best technologies of its time. It would go on to serve in multiple roles in the RAF due to its flexibility and firepower. The design was highly popular in the service of the RAF well into the fall of most the Republic's Prefectures to invading forces after 3132. While part of many Republic Standing Guard units, the Scapha was noted for delaying the fall of many Republic worlds. Designed as a fast and flexible tank, the Scapha is powered by a Strand 265-rated Extra-Extralight Fusion Engine, giving excess speed. Despite the cost of the engine and its bulkiness, the Scapha has thirteen tons of pod space for weapons and equipment. Protecting its armored hide is 7.5 tons of Grumman CRR Reflective Armor which dampens the damage caused by energy weapons. Fusion: Expensive engine that works in a Vacuum. Movement: 11/17 Hex: 330/510 Meters. Armor: Reflective Coating Structure: Structure Values A S Front 185 20 Left 105 20 Right 105 20 Rear 100 20 Turret 160 20 Total 655 100 Quirk: Variable Range Targeting Omni Vehicle

YangsThoughts: It's a tank, Boss, they all look the same to me.
